title: Hate That I Love You
lyrics: That’s how much I love you That’s how much I need you . And I can’t stand ya. Must everything you do make me wanna smile Can I not like it for awhile . No...... but you won’t let me You upset me girl, then you kiss my lips All of a sudden I forge t that I was upset Can ’t remember what you did Sad and it’s not fair how you take advantage of the fact that I
